text: Lloyd Ellingson (February 23, 1908 - March 28, 1946) was an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1932 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1946 deaths Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:People from Colfax, Wisconsin Category:Sportspeople from Wisconsin
title: Lloyd Ellingson
